TopicTitle: First Post, First .20.x Mission to Lathe

Articles.Content:
Hello All! First time posting! I've finally finished constructing my ship, the Lathe-Or-Bust-1, that will carry 5 kerbals to fame or doom!

Here's hoping!
correct me if i'm wrong but it look like you are low on fuel...also whats with all those (empty)RCS-tanks
That are a lot of RCS tanks..
